description: Provides services for file operations: read, write, append
explanation: This plugin takes a path and optional content and executes the selected operation. Python version with enhanced security and error handling.
inputGuidance: FILE_OPERATION requires 'path' or 'fileId' and 'operation' inputs.  The path or file MUST be created in this step or confirmed to be created by a previous step. Ensure your plans do not refer to files or folders that you are not sure exist. Written files are shared with the user and this is the best way to share workproducts.

inputDefinitions.name: path
inputDefinitions.description: The path for the filename to read, write, or append content (relative paths only for security)

inputDefinitions.name: fileId
inputDefinitions.description: File ID from MissionFile system (alternative to path). When provided, the file will be read from the Librarian service using this ID.

inputDefinitions.name: content
inputDefinitions.description: For write and append operations, the content to write or append

inputDefinitions.name: missionId
inputDefinitions.description: The ID of the mission, used for scoping file operations and linking files to the correct mission.

outputDefinitions.name: result
outputDefinitions.description: Content for read operations, null for write/append operations
